content: निःश्रेयसं [निश्चितं श्रेयः नि°] Final beatitude, absolution.

--श्रेयस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} the best, most excellent. (--सः an epithet of Śiva. (--सं {1} final beatitude, absolution; see निःश्रेयस also. {2} devotion, faith, belief. {3} apprehension, conception. {4} happiness (in general), welfare.
